name: Community Environment Day at Bridgepoint Hospital
description:
Join Councillor Fletcher (Ward 14) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free loose compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted). Please bring a container to pick up loose compost.
